text: seongjeon-e imhaji anihaessdeon geu deul-eun seonjija dwie nam-aissneun geos-e gippeohamyeo geudeul-ui jaesangwa jasindeul lo hananim-eul wihae seongjeonhalyeo haji anihago ohilyeo deounde chuljeonhajimalla hayeossdeola illeogalodoe jiog ui bulgil-eun deoug tteugeobnola geuleonde do geudeul-eun ihaehaji moshadeola
